overview:
As Vice President of Sales and Marketing, Jim Fanella is leading MEEZA’s sales and marketing strategies and execution. Jim brings over 29 years of experience in the high tech industry with proven success in leading direct sales, channel management, professional services and marketing.

Jim has held senior level positions including Senior Vice President of Yahoo! where he lead their Global Enterprise Solutions Group, which included Enterprise Portals, Streaming Media, Small Business, and Electronic Storefronts all of which accounted for over 20% of the company’s worldwide revenues. In addition, Jim was a Managing Partner for Unisys, leading all of their Financial Services consulting in the United States.

Jim also served as Chief Operating Officer for Computer Network Technology, a $500 million storage networking company.
